alert.note: Alert for Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 12:39PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Navajo County around White Cone through 215 PM MDT/115 PM MST/... At 138 PM MDT/1238 PM MST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near White Cone moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... White Cone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264
